name: Melvin Lee
summary: Web engineer; comfortable with various parts of the stack. Passionate about learning web technologies and building web applications since the age of 13.

experiences.title: Web Engineer
experiences.summary:
Tech in Asia (YC W15) is a media, events, and jobs platform for Asia’s tech communities.
Part of the web engineering team that is in charge of development and maintenance of Tech in Asia's international website.
- Maintain startup / investor database & API for jobs platform - powered by Laravel (PHP).
- Maintain media front-end - powered by React.
- Build and deploy serverless applications with AWS Lambda + API Gateway.
- Lead efforts to rebuild Tech in Asia's front-end using React - launched in December 2015.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.summary: - Developed core web application with Yii Framework (PHP / MySQL).\r\n- Developed other technologies for task-based usability testing using Node and Python.

experiences.title: Web Designer / Developer
experiences.summary: - Designed and developed websites for numerous companies.\r\n- Sites are usually deployed under WordPress CMS.\r\n- Developed customized WordPress plugins based on client needs.

education.course_title: Computing (Honours, Second Upper) in Communications and Media, Computer Science

education.institution: DPG Awards 2011 - Excellence Award in Dedication (Individual), Silver Medal (Web Design), Book Prize - 2nd Prize, 6th School of Computing Term Project Showcase - 2nd Prize, Dean's List
